data.what_is: Oncord is the complete website and digital marketing platform. Simple, secure and connected. Take control of your website pages and publish blog articles with an intuitive drag-and-drop page editor. Use web forms to grow an accurate contact database. Get better results from your digital marketing efforts by sending targeted email and SMS messages. Improve your campaigns with insightful statistics. Sell online, and integrate with popular accounting and CRM solutions.
data.product_description: Manage a website that you're proud to have represent your business. It's secure, fast, ranks well in search and looks great. Build an accurate contact database which shows the journey from a visit to a conversion, and where you can improve. Attract more business and be seen with a suite of tools for publishing via e-mail, social media, SMS and automation. Sell online or offline, manage recurring payments and take advantage of perfect 2-way integration with your accounting software.

pricing_plans.plan_description:
Impress your customers with a modern, up-to-date website that looks great on mobile devices. Control website pages and publish blog articles with an intuitive drag-and-drop page editor.

Website form submissions create new contacts to help grow your database, and Oncord provides a complete overview of how contacts interact with your website.
plan_features: Premium cloud hosting inc. 5GB storage and 10GB bandwidth
Detailed activity feed of all interactions

pricing_plans.plan_description: Perfectly integration email and SMS tools. Get better results from your digital marketing budget by sending targeted messages based on any activity within Oncord, and improve your campaigns with insightful statistics.
plan_features: E-mail marketing (10,000 email sends per month)
Generate e-mail newsletters from website posts
Send targeted e-mail and SMS based on activity or groups

pricing_plans.plan_description: Sell products, memberships, donations or events from your website. Setup discounts, manage recurring billing and integrate with popular accounting and payment solutions.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best CMS/ CRM software on the market for our industry
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Oncord?
The extent of services included, plus the specific module AFs have developed for their course management, the ongoing improvements, pricing, a perfect fit for SMEs.
You have a 360-degree management of activity without the need for specialized or more complex tools.
CMS, Automations, Courses management, etc.

What do you dislike about Oncord?
No specific aspects are disliked. Might improve the number of available external Apps ready-to-use.

Recommendations to others considering Oncord:
If you are an SME, Oncord is an excellent choice as it provides a unique tool that covers all functions of the company. No need to multiply providers and tools. Their constant improvements and the ones that you may request make that the software remains up-to-date and performing. For Alliance francaises and Instituts Francais in the world, the exclusive specific module for our network is the top on the market and should definitely be considered when thinking of a new system.

What problems is Oncord solving and how is that benefiting you?
A complete voyage of our customers through our services.
A strong presence on the web with integrated SEO tools, as well as a global good level of protection/safety.
This software implied a strong growth in our activity, a better visibility and a very quick response to updates and time-to-market.
